Package com.gemalto.riskengine

package com.gemalto.riskengine
  • Class
    Description
    GAHConfig
    This interface is the parent Config for all modules.
    GAHCore
    This class is the entry point to IdCloud Fraud Prevention library and holds all APIs for configuration and functionality.
    GAHCoreConfig
    This class will provide mechanism to set configurable setting in RiskEngine core module.
    GAHCoreConfig.Builder
    Builder class for configurations of GAHCore module.
    GAHCoreConfig.Permit
    Attributes of a TLS connection that can be overridden to permit the specified behavior.
    GAHErrorCodes
    This class holds the possible error codes by GAHRiskEngine when failed to prefetch signals or failed to get VisitID.
    GAHErrorListener
    Callback to decide the action to taken on detection of hooking from the SDK.
    GAHGemaltoSignalConfig
    Class to set different configuration parameters for initialization of all Gemalto signal groups.
    GAHGemaltoSignalConfig.Builder
    Builder class for Gemalto signal configurations.
    GAHMetaInformation
    This class provides public api to know meta information about the SDK.
    GAHPrefetchStatusCallback
    GAHPrefetchStatusCallback is an interface, which provides the call back to the App, on completion of signals Prefetch.
    GAHProfileTransactionCallback
    GAHProfiletransactionCallback is an interface, which provides the call back to App once App calls profileTransaction.
    GAHProfilingOptions
    Class to set different configuration parameters for profiling/signal collection of ThreatMetrix Signal group.
    GAHProfilingOptions.Builder
    Builder class for ThreatMetrix signal group custom signals.
    GAHResponseCallback
    GAHResponseCallback is an interface, which provides the call back to App with visitID fetched from GAH backend, once App calls requestVisitID().
    GAHSignalCollectionCallback
    GAHSignalCollectionCallback is an interface, which provides the call back methods from GAHRiskEngine, once GAHRiskEngine completes all signal collection, signal list as configured by application.
    GAHSignalGroupConstants
    This class holds various constants that can be used by application to pass as parameters to APIs.
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.ApplicationSignalEnum
    Application signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.BrowserSignalEnum
    Browser signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.DeviceSignalEnum
    Device signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.ISignalGroupName
    Type interface to pass signal groups to be considered for risk calculation
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.ISignalName
    Type interface to pass signals to be collected for risk calculation
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.LocationSignalEnum
    Location signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.NetworkSettingsSignalEnum
    NetworkSettings signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.NetworkSignalEnum
    Network signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.PlatformSettingsSignalEnum
    PlatformSettings signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.PlatformSignalEnum
    Platform signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.SDKSignalEnum
    SDK signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.SignalCollectionStatus
    This enum defines the signal collection status from SDK and is returned from isSignalCollectionCompleted().
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.SignalGroupEnum
    Signal group list enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.SIMSignalEnum
    SIM signal group enum
    GAHSignalGroupConstants.ThreatMetrixSignalEnum
    ThreatMetrix signal group enum
    GAHTMXConfig
    Class to set different configuration parameters for initialization of ThreatMetrix Signal group.
    GAHTMXConfig.Builder
    Builder class for ThreatMetrix signal group configurations.
